fields.title: Wheat Seeds
fields.description: High-yield wheat seeds suitable for all soil types. Drought-resistant and provides better germination rates. Ideal for Rabi season cultivation.
fields.composition: 98% pure wheat seed, 1% inert matter, 1% other crop seed. Germination rate: 90%.
fields.prodapp: Sow directly in well-prepared soil. Requires 25–30 kg per acre. Apply nitrogen fertilizer at the time of sowing for best results.

fields.title: Maize Seeds
fields.description: High-quality hybrid maize seeds with excellent disease resistance and superior grain quality. Suitable for Kharif and Rabi seasons. Provides high yield with shorter maturity period.
fields.composition: 96% pure maize seed, 2% inert matter, 2% other crop seed. Germination rate: 92%.
fields.prodapp: Sow at 20–25 kg per acre in well-prepared soil. Maintain 60–75 cm row spacing. Apply nitrogen-rich fertilizer for maximum yield

fields.title: Tomato Seed
fields.description: High-yielding hybrid tomato seeds with uniform fruit size, deep red color, and excellent shelf life
fields.composition: 95% pure tomato seed, 3% inert matter, 2% other seed. Germination rate: 90%.
fields.prodapp: Sow 100–120 g per acre in raised beds. Ideal for both open field and polyhouse cultivation.

fields.title: Onion Seed
fields.description: Early maturing onion seeds producing uniform bulbs with pungent flavor and long storage life.
fields.composition: 97% pure onion seed, 2% inert matter, 1% other crop seed. Germination rate: 88%.
fields.prodapp: Requires 8–10 kg per acre. Sow in well-drained soil with 15 cm spacing

fields.title: Watermelon Seed
fields.description: High-yielding hybrid watermelon seeds producing large, sweet fruits with deep red flesh
fields.composition: 95% pure watermelon seed, 3% inert matter, 2% other seed. Germination rate: 92%.
fields.prodapp: Requires 1–1.5 kg per acre. Plant in sandy loam soil with 2 m spacing.

fields.title: Mahyco TUBERZAN Paddy Seeds
fields.description: High-yielding hybrid paddy seeds resistant to major diseases, producing medium-grain, aromatic rice.
fields.composition: 96% pure seed, 2% inert matter, 2% other seed. Germination rate: 90%.
fields.prodapp: Requires 20–25 kg per acre. Suitable for loamy soils; sowing depth: 2–3 cm

fields.title: Purnima Super Hybrid Paddy Seeds
fields.description: Superior hybrid paddy with excellent grain quality and high resistance to bacterial blight and blast.
fields.composition: 95% pure seed, 3% inert matter, 2% other seed. Germination rate: 91%.
fields.prodapp: 18–22 kg per acre. Suitable for transplanting in fertile clay loam soil.

fields.title: Yashoda Hybrid Paddy Seeds (YS-5005)
fields.description: Early maturing hybrid paddy with high yield potential and uniform grain size.
fields.composition: 94% pure seed, 4% inert matter, 2% other seed. Germination rate: 89%.
fields.prodapp: 20 kg per acre. Plant in alluvial soils with 25 cm spacing.

fields.title: PR-126 Hybrid Paddy Seeds
fields.description: Short-duration variety ideal for quick harvesting cycles and high yield.
fields.composition: 95% pure seed, 3% inert matter, 2% other seed. Germination rate: 92%.
fields.prodapp: 22 kg per acre. Works best in clay loam soil with regular irrigation.

fields.title: Mahyco MRP 5477 Paddy Seeds
fields.description: Premium quality grains with high market demand, resistant to leaf blast.
fields.composition: 97% pure seed, 2% inert matter, 1% other seed. Germination rate: 93%.
fields.prodapp: 25 kg per acre. Plant in well-drained loamy soil with 25 cm row spacing.

fields.title: Volkman Pet Products Paddy Rice 50lb
fields.description: High-quality large-bag paddy seed ideal for extensive cultivation.
fields.composition: 98% pure seed, 1% inert matter, 1% other seed. Germination rate: 94%.
fields.prodapp: 50 lb per acre. Suitable for alluvial soil; maintain 25 cm row spacing.
